channel.title: Xǐqìng Exhibition: A Modern Tribute to Chinese Paper Art
channel.description: Explore Xǐqìng, a photo collection inspired by Lu Shengzhong, capturing Chinese New Year's spirit through paper-cut dragons and cultural narratives.
